meanings.definition: Showing a blush or flushed complexion due to embarrassment or shyness.
meanings.sent1: The blushful girl turned red when she was complimented.
meanings.sent2: She felt blushful when all eyes turned to her during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The blushful student accidentally called the teacher 'mom' in class.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a blushful hue.
meanings.sent5: Her blushful cheeks revealed her inner feelings.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to blush easily.
meanings.sent1: He was a blushful person who blushed at the slightest praise.
meanings.sent2: The blushful child blushed even when praised for small achievements.
meanings.sent3: The blushful man turned red when his crush waved at him.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed blushful under the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The shy puppy had a blushful demeanor around strangers.
